price: Fir‘aon àti àwọn tó ṣíwájú rẹ̀ àti àwọn ìlú tí wọ́n dojú rẹ̀ bolẹ̀ dé pẹ̀lú àwọn àṣìṣe.
arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wajāa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi-ati
